channel.description: The Latest Soccer News from around the globe.

item.title: Brazil 0 Venezuela 0: Boos ring out as VAR frustrates Copa hosts
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Brazil were twice denied by the VAR as the Selecao were frustrated by Venezuela in a 0-0 draw at the Copa America. Boos and whistles could be heard at Arena Fonte Nova – just like there were in Sao Paulo last week – following Brazil’s scoreless performance in Salvador on Tuesday. Roberto Firmino had a […]

The post Brazil 0 Venezuela 0: Boos ring out as VAR frustrates Copa hosts appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Mourinho eyes national team job
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Jose Mourinho revealed he saw his return to management coming in the international arena. Mourinho is yet to take on a new role since being sacked by Manchester United in December last year. The Portuguese tactician has been linked with several clubs, but Mourinho said he could take the helm of a national team for […]

The post Mourinho eyes national team job appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: De Ligt shouldn´t join Man United – Gullit
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Ajax star Matthijs de Ligt should avoid joining Manchester United this close season, according to Ruud Gullit. De Ligt, 19, has been linked with numerous European heavyweights, including United, Liverpool and Barcelona, although Paris Saint-Germain are reportedly favourites to sign the centre-back. Netherlands great Gullit feels his fellow Dutchman should not head to Old Trafford […]

The post De Ligt shouldn´t join Man United – Gullit appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Bolivia 1 Peru 3: Guerrero inspires Copa comeback
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Paolo Guerrero scored and set up another as Peru kick-started their Copa America campaign with a come-from-behind 3-1 victory over Bolivia at the Maracana. Peru stuttered to a goalless draw against Venezuela in their Group A opener and Ricardo Gareca’s men fell behind to Marcelo Martins’ 18th international goal in Rio de Janeiro on Tuesday. […]

The post Bolivia 1 Peru 3: Guerrero inspires Copa comeback appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Euro U21s Review: 10-man England crumble at the end, Romania crush Croatia
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
England crumbled to a dramatic 2-1 defeat to France in their European Under-21 Championship opener on Tuesday after having Hamza Choudhury sent off, while Romania thrashed Croatia 4-1. The Young Lions impressed in the first half, looking by far the more promising of the two sides going forward, with Demarai Gray going close twice. Nevertheless, […]

The post Euro U21s Review: 10-man England crumble at the end, Romania crush Croatia appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Women´s World Cup Review: Marta makes history as Brazil progress, Kerr-inspired Australia cruise
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Marta overtook Miroslav Klose to become the World Cup’s new all-time leading goalscorer as Brazil beat Italy 1-0 to reach the last 16, with a Sam Kerr-inspired Australia also progressing after they crushed Jamaica 4-1. Group C winners Italy had already confirmed their spot in the next round, and although they kept things tight, Brazil just about […]

The post Women´s World Cup Review: Marta makes history as Brazil progress, Kerr-inspired Australia cruise appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Simeone talks up Atletico´s youth development amid Joao Felix speculation
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Diego Simeone talked up Atletico Madrid’s track record of developing young players amid speculation they are closing in on Benfica talent Joao Felix. Media reports began to emerge on Monday, claiming Atletico had struck a deal with Portuguese champions Benfica for the 19-year-old attacking midfielder – who scored 15 goals and set up another seven […]

The post Simeone talks up Atletico´s youth development amid Joao Felix speculation appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Villa in for Kongolo
item.dc:creator: Deke Hardman
item.description:
Aston Villa are lining up a move for Huddersfield Town defender Terence Kongolo, according to the Mail Online. The Villains are keen to strengthen their squad ahead of their return to the top flight, and have identified the Netherlands internationals as one of their top defensive targets. Having initially moved to the John Smiths Stadium […]

The post Villa in for Kongolo appeared first on Soccer News.

item.title: Marta makes World Cup history with record 17th goal
item.dc:creator: SoccerNews
item.description:
Marta made history as she scored a record 17th World Cup goal to put Brazil ahead against Italy on Tuesday. The 33-year-old had moved level with former Germany star Miroslav Klose’s haul of 16 goals with her penalty in a 3-2 defeat to Australia in Brazil’s second Group C match. And Marta moved one clear […]

The post Marta makes World Cup history with record 17th goal appeared first on Soccer News.
